net.minecraft.src.forge

Interface IConnectionHandler


  • public interface IConnectionHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OnConnect(NetworkManager network)
      Raised when a Client successfully connects it's socket to the Server.
      void OnDisconnect(NetworkManager network, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Object[] args)
      Raised whenever the socket is closed, can be caused by various reasons.
      void OnLogin(NetworkManager network, Packet1Login login)
      Raised when you receive a Packet1Login.

    • Method Detail

      • OnConnect

        void OnConnect(NetworkManager network)
        Raised when a Client successfully connects it's socket to the Server.
        Parameters:
        network - The new NetworkManager associated with this connection.

      • OnLogin

        void OnLogin(NetworkManager network,
             Packet1Login login)
        Raised when you receive a Packet1Login. On the server, it is raised after the NetHandler is switched, and the initial user placement/info packets are sent. On the client, this is raised after the packet is parsed, and the user is sitting at the 'Downloading Terrain' screen.
        Parameters:
        network - The NetoworkManager associated with this connection.
        login - The login packet

      • OnDisconnect

        void OnDisconnect(NetworkManager network,
                  java.lang.String message,
                  java.lang.Object[] args)
        Raised whenever the socket is closed, can be caused by various reasons.
        Parameters:
        network - The NetworkManager associated with this connection.
        message - The translated message to be displayed for this disconnection.
        args - Any additional arguments that the code may of provided. Sometimes this is further explanation, or a Throwable, in the case of errors.
